title: Engine Oil Pressure
description: If it blinks while the engine is running, it may indicate that the engine oil pressure is low

title: Low Tire Pressure
description: When it illuminates, you should stop and adjust the tire pressure to the recommended COLD tire pressure shown on the label.

title: Seat Belt
description: It reminds you to fasten your seat belts.

title: Slip Indicator
description: It will illuminate when the Vehicle Dynamic Control (VDC) system is operating.
